channel.title: Hoster!
channel.description:
hey everyone i got a extra system and i am gona host severs on it and i want to see how it does with just 2 servers (mine) and i will host 1 other server. 24/7, you will need your own restarter,(if needed), and talk to me on msn. indianman3@hotmail.com. and yes i charge 1m runescape gold per 2 weeks, THIS IS NOT A RIPP OFF... in anyway. because i am basically spending $80.00 USD for power and internet for the comp. and you are geting it for a price of $4.50 per 2 weeks, which is $9.00 USD for the month.
thanks
Indian[br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 19:53:22[/size][hr]or just pm me because there is a problem with my msn[br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 19:55:53[/size][hr]ok my msn is up you can talk to me on msn[br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 20:08:24[/size][hr]no 1 needs a hoster? [br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 20:16:14[/size][hr]no1 needs hoster?
